title: Zoopla Property Scraper
description: JSON-first Zoopla scraper with HTML and sitemap fallbacks. Supports pagination, detail extraction, and proxy configuration.

startUrls.title: Multiple search URLs
startUrls.description: Optional list of Zoopla search URLs to crawl.

results_wanted.title: Maximum listings to extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of property listings to collect (1-1000).

max_pages.title: Maximum pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search pages to process per URL.

pageSize.title: API page size
pageSize.description: Preferred page size for JSON API requests (when supported).

collectDetails.title: Collect full property details
collectDetails.description: Visit each property detail page to extract descriptions, images, and structured data.

useJsonApi.title: Use JSON API first
useJsonApi.description: Attempt JSON API endpoints before HTML scraping.

useHtmlFallback.title: Use HTML fallback
useHtmlFallback.description: Fallback to HTML parsing when API results are not available.

useSitemap.title: Use sitemap fallback
useSitemap.description: Try sitemap discovery if API and HTML results are insufficient.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Recommended: use Apify Proxy for reliability.
